nl.helixsoft.recordstream

Class TabularIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.helixsoft.recordstream.TabularIO

  • public class TabularIO
extends java.lang.Object
    Various functions for reading / writing tabular data formats. Merges TsvRecordStream and RecordStreamFormatter in a more sensible naming structure

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TabularIO.WriteBuilder
      Builder pattern to compose a tabular write operation

      • openz

        public static TsvRecordStream.Builder openz(java.io.File _file)
                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Open a File and create a RecordStream from it. If the file happens to end with .gz or .xz, then the file is automatically decompressed upon reading.
        Returns:
        a builder object, on which configuration settings can be chained.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • write

        public static TabularIO.WriteBuilder write(DataFrame df)
                                    throws StreamException
        start building a write operation, starting from a DataFrame as the source data. Follow this with additional WriteBuilder methods such as to() to specify the file or destination to write to, and go () to perform the actual write.
        Throws:
        StreamException

      • write

        public static TabularIO.WriteBuilder write(RecordStream rs)
                                    throws StreamException
        start building a write operation, starting from a RecordStream as the source data. Follow this with additional WriteBuilder methods such as to() to specify the file or destination to write to, and go () to perform the actual write.
        Throws:
        StreamException
